title: Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova
summary: Anastasia Sergeyevna "Nastia" Pavlyuchenkova[2] (Russian: Анастаси́я Серге́евна Павлюче́нкова; born 3 July 1991) is a Russian professional tennis player. She is currently the Russian No. 1 player in singles. A junior prodigy, Pavlyuchenkova won three junior Grand Slam titles and became the junior world No. 1, in January 2006, at the age of 14. She continued her success after turning professional, reaching a career-high singles ranking of world No. 11 on 8 November 2021.
